original_text: Jesus said to them, ‘Some teachers of God's Law have now learned about the kingdom of heaven. These men are like the master of a house who takes things out of the room where he keeps them. Some of the valuable things he brings out are new and some of them are old.’
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 그러므로 천국의 제자된 서기관마다 마치 새것과 옛것을 그 곳간에서 내오는 집주인과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: Some teachers of God's Law have now learned
These men are like the master of a house
who takes things out of the room
Some of the valuable things he brings out are new
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 꺼내는 귀한 물건들 중 어떤 것들은 새것이다

sentences.original_text: and some of them are old
